entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
